data.text: @Landmannery Yep, I direct you to any productive salt dome near Beaumont if you would like to experience

@Landmannery A large mineral owner by definition never shoots straight as they are still pissed off at the entire oil industry about some 50 year old still HBP 1/8 lease that their grandfather got ripped off on
@dougrook I passed her on to you and @Boomhower113
@Landmannery Let me know if you need help closing 😜

@sand_frac @Landmannery Goddamn, this is absolutely correct. Nothing worse than the new son-in-law that the old lady puts in charge of surface. 

Can’t I just go direct instead of dealing with this retard?
@Landmannery Assuming you didn’t get the lease bought.

@Landmannery I've found professional landowners rarely have problems with professional landmen; we both know the game.

It's when you throw a rookie landowner or rookie landman (or both) into the mix where shit goes sideways.
